keepConnect.name: Gara wakabatana
keepConnect.helperText: Kana iwe ukadzvanya pane yekutanga link, wobva wachengeta chinongedzo. Izvi zvinoda kutarisisa kuti chinongedzo chichavhiringidzwa zvichiramba zvichinge zvaitika.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: Batanidza URL, semuenzaniso WS: //192.168.0.2: 7001, kana wws: //example.com/path
url.error: Iyo chaiyo URL iri URL kutanga neWS: // kana wws: //
